about_the_game:
"Zombie Wave FM" is an action-packed zombie survival shooter game set in the small mountain town of Gloomtown. Inspired by 1980s nostalgia the game combines thrilling gameplay, a rich storyline, and a retro atmosphere.

As players dive into the world of "Zombie Wave FM," they are thrust into a post-apocalyptic setting where a catastrophic "accident" at the local nuclear power plant has unleashed a horde of ravenous, mutant zombies upon the town. Further investigations would soon uncover a physics experiment gone wrong, opening a portal to somewhere else. Now, the once peaceful and idyllic Gloomtown has turned into a nightmarish battleground. Choose the role of Sheriff Brasco, a stalwart lawman determined to restore order, or many other characters and embark on a journey to save the town from the zombie infestation.

The Zombie Wave Survival mode adds an extra layer of excitement, as players fight through relentless waves of zombies while restoring power to the town. They must strategically unlock different city blocks, locating fuel to power generators and activating radio towers that transmit a mysterious radio signal—futuristic synthwave music that affects the zombies, causing them to flee or attack each other. The goal is to clear the fog of darkness and guide the undead away, block by block, until ultimate safety is achieved.

Engage in Free For All, Multi-Team Deathmatch and Team Tower Defense with players (and bots) across various maps. You'll experience a mix of old school, fast-paced deathmatch action, mixed with some modern style combat. Unlock killstreaks and unleash hell on your enemies. Go on killstreaks for bonus XP. Unlock new weapons and gear. Climb the ranks. Learn the maps and use to your advantage.

With a diverse selection of playable characters, players can choose their avatar and customize their appearance, weapons, and accessories in the loadout menu. They have access to a wide array of firearms, melee weapons, and skins, each with unique attributes. By completing achievements throughout the game, players unlock new weapons and items, enhancing their arsenal and increasing their chances of survival.

short_description: ZombieWave FM is an immersive 1980s zombie-survival shooter. Fight through waves, restore power, unlock areas, and save Gloomtown. Single-player, co-op, and multiplayer modes. Customization, diverse weapons, retro visuals, and a haunting soundtrack. Survive the undead and reclaim the town!
